channel.title: hello on Julien Chien
channel.description: Recent content in hello on Julien Chien

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Hi everyone, this is my personal website. This will hopefully become the center of my internet presence. I will be writing about things I’ve learned, which could be as simple as summaries, to more complex and “original” things like my thoughts and reflections. There will hopefully be a bookshelf / book summaries section, where I summarize and review books. I will probably write about coding related stuff as well, but I’m not yet sure if it should have its own section.

item.title: Hi!
item.description: I’m Julien Chien, nice to meet you! Currently I’m based out of the Los Angeles area while working remotely for San Francisco-based Modern Treasury (we are hiring! - please let me know if you’re interested!). I am passionate about tech, economics, running, football (soccer), communities & how they work, urbanism & cities, and internet phenomena. Feel free to reach me at hello[at]julienchien.com or on Twitter !
